H0.text: Compaction, erosion, cementation, deposition is the correct order in the process of sedimentary rock formation.

H1.text: Compaction, weathering, erosion, cementation is the correct order in the process of sedimentary rock formation.

H2.text: Weathering, deposition, cementation, burial is the correct order in the process of sedimentary rock formation.

H3.text: Weathering, erosion, deposition, and compaction are the correct order in the process of sedimentary rock formation.

A4.text: Lithification follows closely on compaction, as increased temperatures at depth hasten the precipitation of cement that binds the grains together.

A5.text: Erosion removes most deposited sediment shortly after deposition.
